6.4.2 Empirical Means and Covariances
The deﬁnitions in Section 6.4.1 are often also called the population mean population mean
and covarianceand covariance, as it refers to the true statistics for the population. In ma-
chine learning, we need to learn from empirical observations of data. Con-
sider a random variable X. There are two conceptual steps to go from
